Name: Exponent (as a service)
Description: Interview prep service for many career paths, first program was for PM Interview Prep
Comments: If you want additional guidance on the PM Interview process (beyond just reading Cracking the PM Interview) // Also important to note that if you are a member of the Exponent community, you get access to a members-only Slack, which means that your mock interviews might be of higher caliber

Name: Exponent - Interview Questions
Description: List of interview questions asked in real PM interviews
Comments: N/A

Name: Exponent - Mock Interview Videos
Description: Videos of mock interviews, done by current PMs & interviewed by Steven himself
Comments: Really loved this - super great to consult if you're just getting started with mocks / want to watch mocks first

Name: Exponent - Blog
Description: Blog covering a lot of aspects of PM recruiting (have since added more tech career tracks too)
Tags: Advanced Interview Tips, Understand why PM, Advice from an A/PM

Name: Exponent - Company Guides
Description: Guides for each major APM program, details what the process is like
Comments: Understanding what the interview process is like at each of the ~12 major APM programs

Name: StellarPeers
Description: Blog with great examples of PM interview questions, as well as an integrated mock interview calendar to do mock interviews
Comments: Great resource for setting up mock interviews + finding mock partners (there is an option for a 1-1 coaching session with Malena, priced at $250 for one session)

Name: Lewis Lin's Slack Community
Description: Slack community for all things PM recruiting
Comments: When I used this, you would post your Calendly in the Slack and people would sign up for mock interviews
